main.name: Colin Jackson
main.description: I am a Software Engineer that has a love of code and complex problem solving if you want to get to know me more check out the rest of my portfolio
main.bio: Hey i'm Colin, a software engineer who loves the programming process. I love to solve complex problems and implement solutions that are quick and effective. I am a quick learner and am always wanting to expand my knowledge through challenges and learning through my mistakes. Everyday i strive to improve and am ready to face any obstacles that comes my way.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to know more or collaborate on a project message me here!
